title: Turn ¨Assemble¨ option on, in IDA Pro Demo
content:
Is there a way to highlight "assemble" option in EDIT menu at IDA pro to apply a patch. Guess that 
idagui.cfg
must be changed at some point, and turn NO to YES somewhere. I use the last demo version.

answers_data.content:
I'm not sure about last demo version, but as far as I remember there is a following line in 
cfg\idagui.cfg
that may be related. 
DISPLAY_PATCH_SUBMENU    = NO           // Display the Edit,Patch submenu

comments.text: thats correct for ida pro free, wich i cant use, because it gimme EACCESS VIOLATION warning.
